text: Neil Speaight (born 9 September 1978) is a British middle distance runner. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing the |- |1999 |European U23 Championships |Göteborg, Sweden |7th (h) |800m |1:48.42 |- |2009 |European Indoor Championships |Turin, Italy |9th |1500 m |3:51.04 |} ==References== * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:British male middle- distance runners
